Hi All,
I just started reading a book entitled "The Last
Samurai" about Saigo Takamori, the leader of the
Satsuma rebellion. I'm only 30 pages or so into it but
it seems like Watanabe's character could be loosely
based on him.
Any thoughts?

Steve
